job.title: Data Scientist II - US Remote Eligible

help US and Canada branch teams deliver an ideal client experience Edward Jones currently has more branch offices than any other financial services firm and we continue to grow to meet the needs of longterm individual investorsbrJobOverviewbrbrstrongData ScientistbrFirm AnalyticsbrbrstrongThe Data Scientist is responsible for the design and development of complex mathematical methods and must be able to work closely with business partners to develop tailored analytic solutions and be responsible for guiding projects from design through implementation and final delivery to internal
